Title: Afterglow
Production_Co: Elysian Dreams, Moonstone Entertainment, Sandcastle 5 Productions
Cast: Nick Nolte, Julie Christie, Lara Flynn Boyle, Jonny Lee Miller, Jay Underwood, Domini Blythe, Yves Corbeil, Alan Fawcett, Michèle-Barbara Pelletier, France Castel, Genevieve Bissonnette, Claudia Besso, Ivan Smith, Ellen David, Don Jordan
Plot: A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same. Two families are unhappy with their respective relationships: first of ambitious businessman Jeffrey Byron and sexually frustrated Marianne and second of repair contractor Lucky Mann and former B-movie actress Phyllis. When Lucky arrives to Byron's apartment to make some minor repair and Marianne becomes obsessed with him, the everyday balance breaks. Written by Anonymous
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 2 nominations.
Actors: Nick Nolte, Julie Christie, Lara Flynn Boyle
Description: Directed by Alan Rudolph.  With Nick Nolte, Julie Christie, Lara Flynn Boyle, Jonny Lee Miller. A handyman with marital problems meets a housewife with the same.
